sn45.15:1.2: “Mendicants, these eight things don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.
sn45.15:1.4: They are: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.15:1.5: These are the eight things that don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.”
